name: Rabbit Raiser in the Rabbictuary
description:
Hi !

Remember the Rabbit Raiser ? ( of course you remember, if not you wouldn't be here )

I finally managed to finish this sequel, in a very different style.

It ended being a slightly difficult ( i tried to keep it not too hard ) and short little die and retry platformer.

I won't speak too much this time, and let you discover it as you wish.

My apologies for the very few bugs that you may encounter, that is my first pico-8 attempt.

Hope you will have some fun playing this tiny game.

See ya !

Here is the cart for those interested:
